en.name: Ivan Shtarbanov
en.briefIntro: Hello, my name is Ivan, I am 26 years old and I am aspiring to become a front-end web developer. I have experience with most major front-end technologies, but I've also worked with some back-end technologies as well. I excel in pure JavaScript, including the newest ECMAscript standards. Click the button below to find more about me and my skills.

perks.name: Attention to even the smallest detail
